00039 #define EPS 1.0e-8
00040 
00041 extern std::ofstream *ofs;
00042 const real g_geomfac = 2.0 / sqrt( 3.0 );
00043 
00044 inline void 
00045 SPLINEQ( double invr, double r2, double twoh, double& a, double& b,
00046      double& c, double& d ) {
00047   double u, dih, dir = ( invr );
00048   if ( ( r2 ) < ( twoh ) * ( twoh ) ) {
00049     dih = 2.0 / ( twoh );
00050     u = dih / dir;
00051     if ( u < 1.0 ) {
00052       a = dih * ( 7.0 / 5.0 - 2.0 / 3.0 * u * u + 3.0 / 10.0 * u * u * u * u
00053           - 1.0 / 10.0 * u * u * u * u * u );
00054       b = dih * dih * dih * ( 4.0 / 3.0 - 6.0 / 5.0 * u * u + 1.0 / 2.0 * u * u * u );
00055       c = dih * dih * dih * dih * dih * ( 12.0 / 5.0 - 3.0 / 2.0 * u );
00056       d = 3.0 / 2.0 * dih * dih * dih * dih * dih * dih * dir;
00057     } else {
00058       a = -1.0 / 15.0 * dir + dih * ( 8.0 / 5.0 - 4.0 / 3.0 * u * u + u * u * u
00059                       - 3.0 / 10.0 * u * u * u * u + 1.0 / 30.0 * u * u * u * u * u );
00060       b = -1.0 / 15.0 * dir * dir * dir + dih * dih * dih * ( 8.0 / 3.0 - 3.0 * u + 6.0 / 5.0 * u * u - 1.0 / 6.0 * u * u * u );
00061       c = -1.0 / 5.0 * dir * dir * dir * dir * dir + 3.0 * dih * dih * dih * dih * dir
00062     + dih * dih * dih * dih * dih * ( -12.0 / 5.0 + 1.0 / 2.0 * u );
00063       d = -dir * dir * dir * dir * dir * dir * dir
00064     + 3.0 * dih * dih * dih * dih * dir * dir * dir
00065     - 1.0 / 2.0 * dih * dih * dih * dih * dih * dih * dir;
00066     }
00067   } else {
00068     a = dir;
00069     b = a * a * a;
00070     c = 3.0 * b * a * a;
00071     d = 5.0 * c * a * a;
00072   }
00073 }

00076 class Body {
00077  protected:
00078   real mass;
00079   real x, y, z;
00080 
00081  public:
00082   Body( void )
00083     : mass( 0.0 ), x( 0.0 ), y( 0.0 ), z( 0.0 ) { }
00084 
00085   Body( const std::vector<Body>& Bodies )
00086     : mass( 0.0 ), x( 0.0 ), y( 0.0 ), z( 0.0 ) {
00087     unsigned n = Bodies.size();
00088 
00089     for ( unsigned i = 0;i < n;++i ) {
00090       x += Bodies[ i ].mass * Bodies[ i ].x;
00091       y += Bodies[ i ].mass * Bodies[ i ].y;
00092       z += Bodies[ i ].mass * Bodies[ i ].z;
00093       mass += Bodies[ i ].mass;
00094     }
00095 
00096     x /= mass;
00097     y /= mass;
00098     z /= mass;
00099   }
00100 
00101   Body( const Body& b )
00102     : mass( b.mass ), x( b.x ), y( b.y ), z( b.z ) { }
00103 
00104   Body( real mass_, real x_, real y_, real z_ )
00105     : mass( mass_ ), x( x_ ), y( y_ ), z( z_ ) { }
00106 
00107 
00108   inline real getx( void ) const {
00109     return x;
00110   }
00111   inline real gety( void ) const {
00112     return y;
00113   }
00114   inline real getz( void ) const {
00115     return z;
00116   }
00117   inline real getmass( void ) const {
00118     return mass;
00119   }
00120 };
00121 
00122 class PseudoBody {
00123  protected:
00124   real mass;
00125   real x, y, z;
00126   //real px, py, pz;
00127   real xx, yy, zz, xy, xz, yz;
00128 
00129  public:
00130   PseudoBody( void )
00131     : mass( 0.0 ), x( 0.0 ), y( 0.0 ), z( 0.0 ), xx( 0.0 ), yy( 0.0 ), zz( 0.0 ), xy( 0.0 ), xz( 0.0 ), yz( 0.0 ) { }
00132 
00133   PseudoBody( real mass_, real x_, real y_, real z_ )
00134     : mass( mass_ ), x( x_ ), y( y_ ), z( z_ ),
00135     xx( 0.0 ), yy( 0.0 ), zz( 0.0 ), xy( 0.0 ), xz( 0.0 ), yz( 0.0 ) { }
00136 
00137   PseudoBody( const std::vector<PseudoBody>& Bodies )
00138     : mass( 0.0 ), x( 0.0 ), y( 0.0 ), z( 0.0 ),
00139     xx( 0.0 ), yy( 0.0 ), zz( 0.0 ), xy( 0.0 ), xz( 0.0 ), yz( 0.0 ) {
00140     unsigned n = Bodies.size();
00141     real dx, dy, dz;
00142 
00143     for ( unsigned i = 0;i < n;++i ) {
00144       x += Bodies[ i ].getmass() * Bodies[ i ].getx();
00145       y += Bodies[ i ].getmass() * Bodies[ i ].gety();
00146       z += Bodies[ i ].getmass() * Bodies[ i ].getz();
00147       mass += Bodies[ i ].getmass();
00148     }
00149 
00150     x /= mass;
00151     y /= mass;
00152     z /= mass;
00153 
00154     for ( unsigned i = 0;i < n;++i ) {
00155 
00156       dx = x - Bodies[ i ].getx();
00157       dy = y - Bodies[ i ].gety();
00158       dz = z - Bodies[ i ].getz();
00159 
00160       //real r2 = dx*dx+dy*dy+dz*dz;
00161 
00162       xx += Bodies[ i ].getmass() * dx * dx;
00163       yy += Bodies[ i ].getmass() * dy * dy;
00164       zz += Bodies[ i ].getmass() * dz * dz;
00165       xy += Bodies[ i ].getmass() * dx * dy;
00166       xz += Bodies[ i ].getmass() * dx * dz;
00167       yz += Bodies[ i ].getmass() * dy * dz;
00168     }
00169 
00170   }
00171 
00172 
00173 
00174   PseudoBody( const PseudoBody& b )
00175     : mass( b.mass ), x( b.x ), y( b.y ), z( b.z ),
00176     xx( b.xx ), yy( b.yy ), zz( b.zz ),
00177     xy( b.xy ), xz( b.xz ), yz( b.yz ) { }
00178 
00179 
00180   inline real getx( void ) const {
00181     return x;
00182   }
00183   inline real gety( void ) const {
00184     return y;
00185   }
00186   inline real getz( void ) const {
00187     return z;
00188   }
00189 
00190   inline real getmass( void ) const {
00191     return mass;
00192   }
00193 
00194   inline real getxx( void ) const {
00195     return xx;
00196   }
00197   inline real getyy( void ) const {
00198     return yy;
00199   }
00200   inline real getzz( void ) const {
00201     return zz;
00202   }
00203   inline real getxy( void ) const {
00204     return xy;
00205   }
00206   inline real getyx( void ) const {
00207     return xy;
00208   }
00209   inline real getxz( void ) const {
00210     return xz;
00211   }
00212   inline real getzx( void ) const {
00213     return xz;
00214   }
00215   inline real getyz( void ) const {
00216     return yz;
00217   }
00218   inline real getzy( void ) const {
00219     return yz;
00220   }
00221 };

00224 class kDTreeNode {
00225  protected:
00226   kDTreeNode *m_nleft, *m_nright;
00227 
00228   PseudoBody m_body;
00229   // real m_lx, m_ly, m_lz, m_l;
00230   real m_l;
00231   //real m_xc,m_yc,m_zc;
00232   bool m_bleaf;
00233   int m_axis;
00234 
00235   void partition( std::vector<PseudoBody>& All, std::vector<PseudoBody> **bleft, std::vector<PseudoBody> **bright ) {
00236     unsigned n = All.size();
00237     *bleft = new std::vector<PseudoBody>;
00238     *bright = new std::vector<PseudoBody>;
00239 
00240     int splitdim = m_axis;
00241 
00242     if ( splitdim == 0 ) {
00243       for ( unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00244     if ( All[ i ].getx() < m_body.getx() )
00245       ( *bleft ) ->push_back( All[ i ] );
00246     else
00247       ( *bright ) ->push_back( All[ i ] );
00248       }
00249     } else if ( splitdim == 1 ) {
00250       for ( unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00251     if ( All[ i ].gety() < m_body.gety() )
00252       ( *bleft ) ->push_back( All[ i ] );
00253     else
00254       ( *bright ) ->push_back( All[ i ] );
00255       }
00256     } else {
00257       for ( unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00258     if ( All[ i ].getz() < m_body.getz() )
00259       ( *bleft ) ->push_back( All[ i ] );
00260     else
00261       ( *bright ) ->push_back( All[ i ] );
00262       }
00263     }
00264   }
00265 
00266   void getBoundingBox( const std::vector<PseudoBody>& bodies ) {
00267     real xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax;
00268     xmin = ymin = zmin = 1.0e+30;
00269     xmax = ymax = zmax = -1.0e+30;
00270 
00271     real lx( 0.0 ), ly( 0.0 ), lz( 0.0 );
00272     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < bodies.size(); ++i ) {
00273 
00274       if ( bodies[ i ].getx() < xmin )
00275     xmin = bodies[ i ].getx();
00276       if ( bodies[ i ].getx() > xmax )
00277     xmax = bodies[ i ].getx();
00278 
00279       if ( bodies[ i ].gety() < ymin )
00280     ymin = bodies[ i ].gety();
00281       if ( bodies[ i ].gety() > ymax )
00282     ymax = bodies[ i ].gety();
00283 
00284       if ( bodies[ i ].getz() < zmin )
00285     zmin = bodies[ i ].getz();
00286       if ( bodies[ i ].getz() > zmax )
00287     zmax = bodies[ i ].getz();
00288 
00289 
00290     }
00291 
00292     lx = xmax - xmin;
00293     ly = ymax - ymin;
00294     lz = zmax - zmin;
00295 
00296     m_l = std::max( std::max( lx, ly ), lz );
00297 
00298   }
00299 
00300 
00301  public:
00302 
00303   ~kDTreeNode() {
00304     if ( m_nleft != NULL )
00305       delete m_nleft;
00306     if ( m_nright != NULL )
00307       delete m_nright;
00308   }
00309 
00310   kDTreeNode( std::vector<PseudoBody> *Bodies )
00311     : m_nleft( NULL ),
00312     m_nright( NULL ),
00313     m_body( *Bodies ),
00314     m_bleaf( false ) {
00315 
00316     if ( Bodies->size() > 1 ) {
00317       getBoundingBox( *Bodies );
00318     }
00319   }
00320 
00321 
00322 
00323   kDTreeNode( std::vector<PseudoBody>& Bodies )
00324     : m_nleft( NULL ),
00325     m_nright( NULL ),
00326     m_body( Bodies ),
00327     m_bleaf( false ) {
00328 
00329     std::queue< kDTreeNode * > nqueue;
00330     std::queue< std::vector<PseudoBody>* > nbodyqueue;
00331     kDTreeNode *nptr;
00332     std::vector<PseudoBody>* nbodyptr;
00333 
00334     std::vector<PseudoBody> *pbod = new std::vector<PseudoBody>( Bodies );
00335 
00336     nqueue.push( this );
00337     nbodyqueue.push( pbod );
00338     getBoundingBox( Bodies );
00339 
00340     m_axis = 0;
00341     unsigned nodecount( 0 );
00342 
00343     while ( ! nqueue.empty() ) {
00344 
00345       ++nodecount;
00346 
00347       nptr = nqueue.front();
00348       nqueue.pop();
00349 
00350       nbodyptr = nbodyqueue.front();
00351       nbodyqueue.pop();
00352 
00353       if ( nbodyptr->size() > 1 ) {
00354 
00355     std::vector<PseudoBody> *LeftBodies, *RightBodies;
00356     nptr->partition( *nbodyptr, &LeftBodies, &RightBodies );
00357 
00358     nptr->m_nleft = new kDTreeNode( LeftBodies );
00359     nptr->m_nleft->m_axis = ( nptr->m_axis + 1 ) % 3;
00360     nqueue.push( nptr->m_nleft );
00361     nbodyqueue.push( LeftBodies );
00362     ++nodecount;
00363 
00364     nptr->m_nright = new kDTreeNode( RightBodies );
00365     nptr->m_nright->m_axis = ( nptr->m_axis + 1 ) % 3;
00366     nqueue.push( nptr->m_nright );
00367     nbodyqueue.push( RightBodies );
00368     ++nodecount;
00369 
00370       } else {
00371     nptr->m_nleft = NULL;
00372     nptr->m_nright = NULL;
00373     nptr->m_bleaf = true;
00374 
00375       }
00376 
00377       delete nbodyptr;
00378     }
00379 
00380     // std::cerr << " - kdTree possesses " << nodecount << " nodes, each requiring " << sizeof(kDTreeNode) << " Bytes = " << nodecount*sizeof(kDTreeNode)/1024.0 << "kB\n";
00381   }
00382 
00383 
00384   // do a level order traversal
00385   real traverse( const real& x, const real& y, const real& z, const real& theta, const real& plumsoft ) {
00386 
00387     std::stack< kDTreeNode * > nqueue;
00388 
00389     nqueue.push( this );
00390     real totforce = 0.0;
00391     kDTreeNode *nptr;
00392 
00393     while ( !nqueue.empty() ) {
00394 
00395       nptr = nqueue.top();
00396       nqueue.pop();
00397 
00398       real
00399     xx = nptr->m_body.getx() - x,
00400     yy = nptr->m_body.gety() - y,
00401     zz = nptr->m_body.getz() - z;
00402 
00403       real r = sqrt( xx * xx + yy * yy + zz * zz );
00404 
00405       if ( nptr->m_bleaf ) {
00406     if ( r > EPS )
00407       totforce += nptr->m_body.getmass() / ( r + plumsoft );
00408 
00409       } else if ( nptr->m_l / r < theta ) {
00410     double a, b, c, d, A, B;
00411     SPLINEQ( 1.0 / r, r * r, plumsoft, a, b, c, d );
00412 
00413     A = 0.5 * ( nptr->m_body.getxx() * xx * xx + nptr->m_body.getyy() * yy * yy + nptr->m_body.getzz() * zz * zz
00414             + 2.0 * nptr->m_body.getxy() * xx * yy + 2.0 * nptr->m_body.getxz() * xx * zz + 2.0 * nptr->m_body.getyz() * yy * zz );
00415     B = 0.5 * ( nptr->m_body.getxx() + nptr->m_body.getyy() + nptr->m_body.getzz() );
00416 
00417     totforce -= nptr->m_body.getmass() * a + c * A - b * B;
00418 
00419       } else {
00420     if ( nptr->m_nleft != NULL )
00421       nqueue.push( nptr->m_nleft );
00422     if ( nptr->m_nright != NULL )
00423       nqueue.push( nptr->m_nright );
00424       }
00425 
00426     }
00427     return totforce;
00428   }
00429

00432

00434

00436     real totforce = 0.0;

00440

00448 
00449     real r = sqrt(xx*xx+yy*yy+zz*zz);
00450 
00451     if( nptr->m_bleaf ){
00452     if( r > EPS )
00453     totforce += nptr->m_body.getmass()/r;
00454             
00455     } else if( nptr->m_l/r < theta ){
00456     totforce += nptr->m_body.getmass()/r;
00457     } else{
00458     if( nptr->m_nleft != NULL )
00459     nqueue.push( nptr->m_nleft );
00460     if( nptr->m_nright != NULL )
00461     nqueue.push( nptr->m_nright );
00462     }

00467     return totforce;
00468     }*/

00475 
00476 class OctTreeNode {
00477 
00478  protected:
00479   OctTreeNode **m_subnodes;
00480 
00481   PseudoBody m_body;
00482 
00483 
00484   real m_xc, m_yc, m_zc;
00485   real m_l;
00486   bool m_bleaf;
00487 
00488   void partition( const std::vector<PseudoBody>& All, std::vector<PseudoBody> ***Bodies ) {
00489     unsigned n = All.size();
00490 
00491     *Bodies = new std::vector<PseudoBody>*[ 8 ];
00492 
00493     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 8; ++i )
00494       ( *Bodies ) [ i ] = new std::vector<PseudoBody>;
00495 
00496     //... assign bodies to octants ...
00497     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i ) {
00498       unsigned ix = 0, iy = 0, iz = 0;
00499       if ( All[ i ].getx() - m_xc > 0 )
00500     ix = 1;
00501       if ( All[ i ].gety() - m_yc > 0 )
00502     iy = 1;
00503       if ( All[ i ].getz() - m_zc > 0 )
00504     iz = 1;
00505 
00506       ( *Bodies ) [ ix + 2 * ( iy + 2 * iz ) ] ->push_back( All[ i ] );
00507     }
00508   }
00509 
00510 
00511 
00512   void getBoundingBox( const std::vector<PseudoBody>& bodies, real &xc, real &yc, real &zc, real &l ) {
00513     real xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax;
00514     xmin = ymin = zmin = 1.0e+30;
00515     xmax = ymax = zmax = -1.0e+30;
00516 
00517     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < bodies.size(); ++i ) {
00518 
00519       if ( bodies[ i ].getx() < xmin )
00520     xmin = bodies[ i ].getx();
00521       if ( bodies[ i ].getx() > xmax )
00522     xmax = bodies[ i ].getx();
00523 
00524       if ( bodies[ i ].gety() < ymin )
00525     ymin = bodies[ i ].gety();
00526       if ( bodies[ i ].gety() > ymax )
00527     ymax = bodies[ i ].gety();
00528 
00529       if ( bodies[ i ].getz() < zmin )
00530     zmin = bodies[ i ].getz();
00531       if ( bodies[ i ].getz() > zmax )
00532     zmax = bodies[ i ].getz();
00533 
00534     }
00535 
00536     l = std::max( std::max( xmax - xmin, ymax - ymin ), zmax - zmin );
00537     xc = 0.5 * ( xmax + xmin );
00538     yc = 0.5 * ( ymax + ymin );
00539     zc = 0.5 * ( zmax + zmin );
00540   }
00541 
00542  public:
00543 
00544   OctTreeNode( std::vector<PseudoBody> *Bodies )
00545     : m_subnodes( NULL ),
00546     m_body( *Bodies ),
00547     m_bleaf( false ) {
00548     if ( Bodies->size() > 1 ) {
00549 
00550       getBoundingBox( *Bodies, m_xc, m_yc, m_zc, m_l );
00551     }
00552   }
00553 
00554   OctTreeNode( std::vector<PseudoBody>& Bodies, real min_size )  //const std::vector<PseudoBody>& Bodies )
00555     :
00556     m_subnodes( NULL ),
00557     m_body( Bodies ),
00558     m_xc( 0.0 ),
00559     m_yc( 0.0 ),
00560     m_zc( 0.0 ),
00561     m_l( 0.0 ),
00562     m_bleaf( false ) {
00563     std::queue< OctTreeNode * > nqueue;
00564     std::queue< std::vector<PseudoBody>* > nbodyqueue;
00565     OctTreeNode *nptr;
00566     std::vector<PseudoBody>* nbodyptr;
00567 
00568     std::vector<PseudoBody> *pbod = &Bodies; //new std::vector<PseudoBody>( Bodies );
00569 
00570     nqueue.push( this );
00571     nbodyqueue.push( pbod );
00572     getBoundingBox( Bodies, m_xc, m_yc, m_zc, m_l );
00573     //std::cerr << " - building oct-tree from " << Bodies.size() << " particles...\n";
00574     unsigned nodecount( 0 );
00575     while ( ! nqueue.empty() ) {
00576       ++nodecount;
00577       nptr = nqueue.front();
00578       nqueue.pop();
00579 
00580       nbodyptr = nbodyqueue.front();
00581       nbodyqueue.pop();
00582 
00583       if ( nbodyptr->size() > 1 ) {
00584     std::vector<PseudoBody> **OctantBodies;
00585     nptr->partition( *nbodyptr, &OctantBodies );
00586     nptr->m_subnodes = new OctTreeNode * [ 8 ];
00587 
00588     for ( int i = 0; i < 8; ++i ) {
00589       if ( OctantBodies[ i ] ->size() > 0 && nptr->m_l > min_size ) {
00590         nptr->m_subnodes[ i ] = new OctTreeNode( OctantBodies[ i ] );
00591         nqueue.push( nptr->m_subnodes[ i ] );
00592         nbodyqueue.push( OctantBodies[ i ] );
00593       } else {
00594         nptr->m_subnodes[ i ] = NULL;
00595         delete OctantBodies[ i ];
00596       }
00597 
00598     }
00599 
00600     delete[] OctantBodies;
00601 
00602       } else {
00603     nptr->m_subnodes = NULL;
00604     nptr->m_bleaf = true;
00605 
00606       }
00607       if ( nbodyptr != pbod )
00608     delete nbodyptr;
00609     }
00610 
00611     //std::cerr << " - OctTree possesses " << nodecount << " nodes, each requiring " << sizeof(OctTreeNode) << " Bytes = " << nodecount*sizeof(OctTreeNode)/1024.0 << "kB\n";
00612   }
00613 
00614   ~OctTreeNode() {
00615     if ( m_subnodes != NULL ) {
00616       for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 8; ++i )
00617     if ( m_subnodes[ i ] != NULL ) {
00618       delete m_subnodes[ i ];
00619     }
00620 
00621       delete[] m_subnodes;
00622     }
00623   }
00624 
00625   // do a level order traversal
00626   real traverse( const real& x, const real& y, const real& z, const real& theta, const real& plumsoft ) {
00627 
00628     //std::queue< OctTreeNode * > nqueue;
00629     std::stack< OctTreeNode * > nqueue;
00630 
00631     nqueue.push( this );
00632     real totforce( 0.0 );
00633     OctTreeNode *nptr;
00634 
00635     while ( !nqueue.empty() ) {
00636       //nptr = nqueue.front();
00637       nptr = nqueue.top();
00638       nqueue.pop();
00639 
00640       real
00641     xx = nptr->m_body.getx() - x,
00642     yy = nptr->m_body.gety() - y,
00643     zz = nptr->m_body.getz() - z;
00644 
00645       real r = sqrt( xx * xx + yy * yy + zz * zz );
00646 
00647       if ( nptr->m_bleaf ) {
00648     if ( r > EPS )
00649       totforce -= nptr->m_body.getmass() / ( r + plumsoft );
00650 
00651       } else if ( nptr->m_l / r < theta ) {
00652 
00653     double a, b, c, d, A, B;
00654     SPLINEQ( 1.0 / r, r * r, plumsoft, a, b, c, d );
00655 
00656     A = 0.5 * ( nptr->m_body.getxx() * xx * xx + nptr->m_body.getyy() * yy * yy + nptr->m_body.getzz() * zz * zz
00657             + 2.0 * nptr->m_body.getxy() * xx * yy + 2.0 * nptr->m_body.getxz() * xx * zz + 2.0 * nptr->m_body.getyz() * yy * zz );
00658     B = 0.5 * ( nptr->m_body.getxx() + nptr->m_body.getyy() + nptr->m_body.getzz() );
00659 
00660     totforce -= nptr->m_body.getmass() * a + c * A - b * B;
00661 
00662       } else
00663     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 8; ++i ) {
00664       if ( nptr->m_subnodes[ i ] != NULL )
00665         nqueue.push( nptr->m_subnodes[ i ] );
00666     }
00667     }
00668     return totforce;
00669   }
00670 };
00671 
00672 #endif
